mapper.select: select dict_type as dictType,id,DICT_ID as dictId, DICT_NAME as dictName, DICT_DESC as dictDesc,DICT_KEY as dictKey,DICT_VALUE as dictValue,dict_data_source as dictDataSource,dict_sql as dictSql,order_num as orderNum from lambo_dict WHERE DICT_ID = #{dictId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by order_num ASC
